tool_description: Easy anti-spam measure which takes it one-step further by blocking potentially bad IP address from using your resources.
name: Anti-Spam Captcha and BOT IP Blocker - versCaptcha
title: Anti-Spam Captcha and BOT IP Blocker - versCaptcha
tool_name: Anti-Spam Captcha and BOT IP Blocker - versCaptcha

api_list.name: Verify an IP
api_list.description: verify_IP() from our functions file available at https://gist.github.com/VersatilityWerks/5608545

api_list.name: Generate Captcha
api_list.description: render_captcha() from our functions file available at https://gist.github.com/VersatilityWerks/5608545

required_parameters.name: theme
required_parameters.description: The id of the theme you'd like to display (get it at https://verscaptcha.com/builder)

api_list.name: White List an IP
api_list.description: whitelist_IP() from our functions file available at https://gist.github.com/VersatilityWerks/5608545

api_list.name: Verify Captcha
api_list.description: verify_captcha() from our functions file available at https://gist.github.com/VersatilityWerks/5608545

required_parameters.name: question
required_parameters.description: The ID of the question which was sent when you generated the captcha  ($_POST['vc_question'])

required_parameters.name: answer
required_parameters.description: The answer entered by the form submitter ($_POST['vc_answer'])

required_parameters.name: ip
required_parameters.description: IP address of the user who is submitting the form  ($_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'])

optional_parameters.name: leave_blank
optional_parameters.description: This is an invisible form item which is meant to be left blank and invisible. Only bots would fill it in and will be blocked  ($_POST['leave_blank'])
